name: EVERSPACE 2 Digital Deluxe Bundle
description:
This bundle contains:

EVERSPACE 2
Launch into a fast-paced single-player spaceship shooter with exploration in space and on planets, tons of loot, RPG elements, mining, and crafting. Experience an exciting sci-fi story set in a vivid, handcrafted open world full of secrets, puzzles, and perils.

The Art of EVERSPACE 2 
Featuring more than 280 pages of concept art and more from Tobias Frank and the ROCKFISH Games art team, this is an explorative behind-the-scenes look at the visual development of one of the most expansive space adventures ever released from an independent video game studio.

16 4k wallpaper images and an 8k starmap are also included with the artbook.

The EVERSPACE 2 Official Soundtrack
Filled with groovy dance tracks, EDM beats, and chill synthwave, the EVERSPACE 2 Official Soundtrack contains 30 tracks totalling more than 90 minutes of music rearranged and remixed by ROCKFISH Games composer Gero Goerlich.
